issues: Coordinate mismatch: 1.16 km distance between asserted coordinates (39.103068, -96.563925) and geocoded location (39.1002012, -96.576798)

Land cover data shows grassland dominance but asserted env_local_scale indicates scrubland
recommendations: Verify and update coordinates to match the intended sampling location at Konza Prairie Biological Station
Review env_local_scale classification - consider changing from 'area of scrub' to 'grassland area' to match land cover data

Consider updating elevation to geospatially-derived value (409.0m) for better accuracy
